name: My China Roots
slogan: Trace Your Chinese Roots and Discover Your Place in History!
description:
We help overseas Chinese trace their ancestry, connect with lost relatives, and travel to their ancestral villages in China.

Genealogy is a 4+bn USD industry that largely ignores 150 million Overseas Chinese. Already leading in bespoke family history research and travel services, we are building the world’s first Online Platform & Database to empower millions to connect with their Chinese roots. 

Join us as game changers in Chinese genealogy and cultural identity, using Optical Character Recognition and Artificial Intelligence to connect family histories and new-found relatives!

team.title: CEO
team.name: Huihan Lie
team.bioHtml: Founder-CEO of My China Roots, leading firm in Chinese family history. Masters in Law. Previously @Suzlon Energy, @APCO Worldwide.

team.name: Pin Wang
team.bioHtml: Founder Substantial Studios • Worked at @App Annie, @Happylatte • Studied at @George Mason University

jobs.title: Software Engineer (full stack)
jobs.description:
Who are we?
We are building the world’s first online database to empower millions of Overseas Chinese to connect with their roots!

Our fast-growing, international and passionate team of 12 already leads the market in custom roots research & travel services (www.mychinaroots.com). Spread out over Beijing, Guangzhou, Paris, and London, we are expanding our tech team to shape and build the future of Chinese genealogy.

What will you do?
• Write code to solve interesting problems, including how to automate digitization of historical Chinese records
• Collaborate with our industry-leading research team to process and build the largest database of Chinese historical records in the world
• Deal with multiple types of servers: bare-metal, cloud, VM, you name it!
• Use an understanding of off-the-shelf opensource and SaaS solutions to accelerate development
• You will help us decide what to build and why, and have full freedom to pursue the how
• You will report to our CTO Jean, who is based in Paris

What do we offer?
• Negotiable salary & equity at fast-growing startup that has already gained traction & momentum
• Creative & collaborative work with multicultural & inspired colleagues
• A unique opportunity to build a platform that provides true socio-cultural value. 

What are we looking for?
• Architect and Developer
o Experience in software architecture design and development skills
o Understanding of database systems, software architecture, devops
o Understanding of best practices necessary to write maintainable code
• Someone who thrives in a startup environment
o Responsible and self-motivated person who can get things done without
micromanagement o A team player
o Fluent English

• Bonus if you have:
o Experience with big data, Optical Character Recognition, Natural Language
Processing, Pattern Recognition
o Chinese language proficiency
o Interest in (overseas) Chinese history and cultural heritage & identity
